com.google.maps.android.kml

Class KmlLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.maps.android.kml.KmlLayer

  • public class KmlLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Document class allows for users to input their KML data and output it onto the map

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KmlLayer(GoogleMap map, java.io.InputStream stream, Context context)
      Creates a new KmlLayer object
      KmlLayer(GoogleMap map, int resourceId, Context context)
      Creates a new KmlLayer object - addLayerToMap() must be called to trigger rendering onto a map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLayerToMap()
      Adds the KML data to the map
      java.lang.Iterable<KmlContainer> getContainers()
      Gets an iterable of KmlContainerInterface objects
      java.lang.Iterable<KmlGroundOverlay> getGroundOverlays()
      Gets an iterable of KmlGroundOverlay objects
      GoogleMap getMap()
      Gets the map that objects are being placed on
      java.lang.Iterable<KmlPlacemark> getPlacemarks()
      Gets an iterable of KmlPlacemark objects
      boolean hasContainers()
      Checks if the layer contains any KmlContainers
      boolean hasPlacemarks()
      Checks if the layer contains placemarks
      void removeLayerFromMap()
      Removes all the KML data from the map and clears all the stored placemarks
      void setMap(GoogleMap map)
      Sets the map that objects are being placed on

                int resourceId,
                Context context)
         throws XmlPullParserException,
                java.io.IOException

        map - GoogleMap object
        resourceId - Raw resource KML file
        context - Context object
        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException - if file cannot be parsed

      • hasContainers

        public boolean hasContainers()
        Checks if the layer contains any KmlContainers
        Returns:
        true if there is at least 1 container within the KmlLayer, false otherwise

      • hasPlacemarks

        public boolean hasPlacemarks()
        Checks if the layer contains placemarks
        Returns:
        true if there are placemarks, false otherwise
